title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Data Source
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Data Field Mapping
content:
Data Field Mapping Attribute Description

completed-field: Set the value corresponding to the milestone completion status. The default value is completed flag-content-field: Set the field name corresponding to the description in the node flag data. The default value is content flag-field: Set the field name of the node flag data. The default value is flags flag-name-field. Set the field name corresponding to the name in the node flag data. The default value is name flag-status-field: Set the field name corresponding to the status in the node flag data. The default value is status name-field: Set the field name corresponding to the name in the node information. The default value is name status-field: Set the field name corresponding to the data status. The default value is status time-field. Field name corresponding to the node time information. The default value is time
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Flag data source node
content: You can use flag-before to set whether the data of the activity (i.e. flag) on the milestone is obtained from the previous node or the subsequent node. The default value is false to obtain the data of the subsequent node.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Progress bar color
content: Sets the line color through the line-style attribute.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Mapping Between Status and Color
content:
In the

milestones-status attribute object, the key corresponds to the status field in the data of the data attribute, and then controls the mapping between different states and colors.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Cancel the display of the sequence number in the unfinished state.
content: After show-number is set to false, the sequence number is not displayed on the node where the milestone is not completed. The default value is true.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Completed node solid display
content: You can set the solid attribute to true to set the completed node to be displayed as solid and the halo is opaque. The default value is false.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Width
content: Use the space attribute to set the width of the step bar.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Start sequence number
content: Set the start sequence number of the milestone node through the start attribute. The default value is - 1.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Custom Node Icons
content: The icon can be customized through the iconscope slot.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Content under a customized node
content: You can customize the content below a node through the bottom scope slot.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Content above the customized node
content: The top scope slot allows you to customize the content above the node.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Custom Flag Content
content: You can customize the content of the node flag through the flag scope slot.
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.

title: Event
content: The click event is triggered when a milestone node is clicked. Parameter: (index: node index; node: node data information). The flag-click event is triggered when a milestone flag is clicked. (index: index of the flag on the node; node: data information of the flag on the node).
findIntroStr: The milestone mode is a highly customized component. Users can customize the component status, node color, and line color. Activity flags can be inserted between nodes. The tip displays activity information.
